about_the_game:
College Bound is back with another episode full of crazy college adventures! Meet new characters, discover new secrets, see new hot scenes... heck, you can even play Blackjack! Added over 1500 images, numerous animations, a couple of music tracks and something you'll probably like the most... 51 new achievements to unlock. Compared to Episode 1, the rendering quality of images and animations is greatly improved - download this free-to-play DLC to check it out yourself!

Episode 2 includes weekly updates from 0.3.7 up to 0.3.20 (inclusive).

An update of Episode 1 (automatic, free and ~40MB in size) is required to run this DLC. The update also improves the dialogues and language in Episode 1, removes every typo we found and optimizes the overall game performance.

Description

The life of a college student can be challenging - whether in the classroom or out of it. In Episode 1, you managed to find a way to convince the annoying university principal to reinstate your foreign exchange program scholarship. Even so, there's more to that situation than meets the eye, and it would be in your best interests to get to the bottom of that and avoid any surprises. Along the way, you meet lots of new, interesting people, some whose interests align with yours, and others that don't. You must navigate through each situation and make the right decisions to make sure that everything works out for the best. Some ominous clouds appear on the horizon, and with your usual aplomb, you must determine the best way forward for all involved. For a young man such as yourself, the opportunities that open up to you in this gorgeous, interactive game world are rather expansive. It's up to you to decide where they will take you.


The game is a visual novel in-progress, utilizing classic Ren'py controls and containing high-quality renders as well as fully-animated, non-censored adult scenes. There's plenty more to come in the future!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game graphically depicts sex and includes mature themes such as drug use and elements of blackmail. While most of the story is light-hearted, parts of it may be problematic for some individuals, especially those easily offended. Please consider this before playing College Bound. Outside of that, have fun and enjoy the ride! All of the scenes are animated, well developed and written to add to the story and the enjoyment of our players.

All characters depicted are at least 21 years of age or older + all sexual acts are consensual. Cheers!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: College Bound - Episode 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: College Bound is back with another episode full of crazy college adventures! Meet new characters, discover new secrets, see new hot scenes... Added over 1500 images, numerous animations, a couple of music tracks. Download this free-to-play DLC and continue your College Bound journey!
